text: Abraham anan purav, ana mbara mba ntara mbuav ndigi bigi, ana nta shɨgap phɨkthɨgi phogi ga vhuigap, ana phok mben Merkisedek ga nɨɨŋgi. Nza kha zɨ Merkisedek, nza ana dorga khɨngiap khaŋ nzuai, “Tɨvir Vhuuiaŋ Mbui Guman Pan.” Ana vhɨra Sareman ŋgu gari guman pan ma. Nza ne dorgap khaŋ nzuai, “Ndava Bavira Ki Guman Pan.”
